post.author: bad marine ass
post.body:
I'm working on my shotgun now, and I did this



As you can see, I removed a few polygons, and now there are ugly holes (circled in the pic). How do I patch these ugly holes up nice and clean?[/img]

post.date: Posted: Sat May 14, 2005 6:31 am Post subject:
post.author: rich_is_bored
post.body:
Select the points around the holes in a clockwise fashion and press "p" to create a polygon. Then use add edges to split the polygon into quads.
